authors.author: Pietro A. Yon William C. Dix

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: This, this is Christ the King, newline Whom shepherds guard and angels sing. newline Haste, haste to bring Him laud, newline The Babe, the Son of Mary.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: What child is this who, newline Laid to rest, newline On Mary's lap is sleeping? newline Whom angels greet with anthems sweet, newline While shepherds watch are keeping.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Why lies He in such mean estate newline Where ox and ass are feeding? newline Good Christian, fear; newline For sinners here newline The silent Word is pleading.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: So bring Him incense, gold and myrrh; newline Come peasant, king to own Him. newline The King of kings salvation brings; newline Let loving hearts enthrone Him.
